channel.title: .Connecting Issue
channel.description: When i download my client on my other computer and run it , just says connection error on the loading bar with the seconds left and they just get more and more. i am running the server from my laptop and i carnt connect from my computer ?

item.title: .Connecting Issue
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Since they are on the same network, the IP address in the client should be the host computers IPv4 Address.

Read full topic
